rooms.description: A welcoming space with natural light coming through large windows.
Combines the kitchen and living area for a spacious social hub featuring ample natural lighting from overhead skylights and side windows, in accordance with Vastu principles.
Traditional Kerala-style bedroom complete with a spacious balcony for natural ventilation and light.
Well-lit bedroom with a small balcony integrated into the design to boost ventilation and light while maintaining privacy.
Compact yet comfortable guest room designed with Vastu principles in mind for auspicious energy flow.
Practical space for household staff including a small kitchenette and bathroom, ensuring privacy while meeting local building norms.

openings.description: Each bedroom features a balcony opening to promote natural light and cross-ventilation.
